transcript:
Customer: Koi jan phone karo. Hello.
Executive: Hello, ji Khan Khan ji baat kar rahe hain? 
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Anke Bridal Aari work. Haan India Mart se baat kar rahi hoon. Sir actually kya hai na ki aapka concern aaya tha India Mart pe ki aap ka thoda sa tha. Baki sir aapko yahi suggest hua hai ki aap waha se buylead na purchase kare sir. Baki service to aapki better chal rahi hai na sir. Usme to koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Madam, ek baat suniye mera baat suniye pehle.
Executive: Boliye boliye.
Customer: Mera dikat aa raha hai, bahut sara dikat aa raha hai. Isiliye maine band karne ke liye socha, maine complaint bhi janaya. Pehle bol diya, Ankit mam ko bhi bola hai, jo mera account manager hai. Usko bhi maine bol diya, bola mera senior se aapko call aayega usse bol dena, theek hai. Isiliye mam mera close karna hai, account close kar dena hai.
Executive: Sir but kyu like reason jo aap de rahe hain na sir uska bhi solution hai ki aap waha se.
Customer: Pehle mera baat suniye mam, pehle jo aapka jo servant aaya tha mere paas account kholne ke liye wo mere ko galat cheez bol ke gaya.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Kya galat bola main aapko clearly bata rahi hoon. Wo bola tumko Chennai mein tumhara account hi nahi dikhega.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Aisa ho nahi sakta net mein google mein search karoge to account business ka account dikhega hi dikhega. Wo pehle bola mera system mein dikhega hi nahi. Pehle mere ko ullu bana ke gaya.
Abhi usko call karta hoon nahi aata hai aadmi bhejta hai do teen din baad baad aadmi bhejta hai. Aisa thodi chalega mam itna main invest kiya hoon main jhamela puane ke liye boliye mam. Mera account hi close kar dijiye mam. Aapse anurodh hai mera account hi close kar dijiye. Mera udhar bahut sara invest kiya hua hai mam.
Executive: Sir uska kuch midway agar solution agar aap dekhe to agar aap buylead na consume kare tab bhi nahi chalega sir. Ki matlab aap baki areas ki consumption kar le.
Customer: Mera party ko pata chal gaya isiliye maine close karna chahti hoon mam.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Isiliye maine close karna chahti hoon. Jis party ne mere ko itna diya main usi se gaddari nahi karunga mam. Pehle bol ke bol ke account khulwaya abhi bol raha hai nahi hoga. Kaise to chalega boliye mam.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Mam mera account close karwa dijiye mam please. Aapse request hai. Nahi to mera pura paisa atak jayega mam barbad ho jaunga mam.
Executive: Sir abhi jo unko pata matlab keh rahe hain aapki cheezein wo ho gayi hai to abhi aap continue karne mein to koi harj nahi hai.
Customer: Mera sunna mera baat suniye mam main main khud khud ka Chennai mein mera aap buylead account kholunga Chennai mein khulunga yaha pe nahi India Mart mein main Chennai mein khulunga tab tab to aap contact kar lunga mam theek hai abhi mera account close karwa dijiye.
Executive: Sir aapki call arrange karati hoon senior se, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close IndiaMART account.

- Account manager provided incorrect information.

- Feels betrayed due to promises not being kept.



Resolution:

- Executive offered alternative solutions.

- Executive offered to arrange a call with senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call with senior.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account closure, incorrect information, refund
